Entry.JapaneseText: 焦るな、<Veigue>。今のおまえでは、 サレたちと戦っても勝ち目は薄い。
Entry.EnglishText: Patience, <Veigue>. You have little chance of defeating Saleh at this time.

Entry.JapaneseText: 技や力を磨き、 万全の態勢を整える事が大切だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's important for you to hone your strength and skills until you have perfected them.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだね、クレアさんを取り戻すには 慎重にいかないと。
Entry.EnglishText: He's right, you've gotta be careful if you want to get Claire back.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もっと強くならなくては…… もっと、もっと強く……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I have to get stronger... Much, much stronger...
